trans-unit.source: "templatestrings.json" file should only contain elements with type "string". Remove elements that are not strings.
trans-unit.target: "templatestrings.json" file should only contain elements with type "string". Remove elements that are not strings.

trans-unit.source: In templatestrings.json file under the post action with "id" "{1}", there are localized strings for manual instruction(s) with ids "{0}". These manual instructions do not exist in the template.json file and should be removed from templatestrings.json file.
trans-unit.target: In templatestrings.json file under the post action with "id" "{1}", there are localized strings for manual instruction(s) with ids "{0}". These manual instructions do not exist in the template.json file and should be removed from templatestrings.json file.
trans-unit.note: {0} is a list of single-word identifier strings separated by comma. Such as "myManualInstruction, someUserPickedText, instruction3". {1} is a single-word identifier string. Such as "myPostAction".

trans-unit.source: Post action(s) with id(s) "{0}" specified in the localization file do not exist in the template.json file. Remove the localized strings from the templatestrings.json file.
trans-unit.target: Post action(s) with id(s) "{0}" specified in the localization file do not exist in the template.json file. Remove the localized strings from the templatestrings.json file.
trans-unit.note: {0} is a list of single-word identifier strings separated by comma. Such as "myManualInstruction, someUserPickedText, instruction3".

trans-unit.source: '{0}' could not be parsed as a regular expression
trans-unit.target: '{0}' não pôde ser analisado como uma expressão regular

trans-unit.source: One or more postActions have a malformed or missing manualInstructions value in '{0}'
trans-unit.target: Uma ou mais ações têm um valor de malformado ou manualInstructions ausente em '{0}'

trans-unit.source: Id of the manual instruction "{0}" at index {1} under post action "{2}" is not unique. Only the first manual instruction that uses this Id will be localized.
trans-unit.target: Id of the manual instruction "{0}" at index {1} under post action "{2}" is not unique. Only the first manual instruction that uses this Id will be localized.
trans-unit.note: {0} is any identifier string that user provided in the file. Such as: "myInstruction", "firstInstruction", "instruction1" etc. {1} is a whole number representing the zero-based index of the manual instruction. Such as "5", or "0". {2} is any identifier string that user provided in the file or a whole number. Such as: myPostAction, firstPostAction, postAction1, 5, 0 etc.

trans-unit.source: A non-bool DataType was specified for a regexMatch type symbol
trans-unit.target: Um DataType não booleano foi especificado para um símbolo de tipo regexMatch

trans-unit.source: Id of the post action "{0}" at index {1} is not unique. Only the first post action that uses this Id will be localized.
trans-unit.target: Id of the post action "{0}" at index {1} is not unique. Only the first post action that uses this Id will be localized.
trans-unit.note: {0} is any identifier string that user provided in the file. Such as "myPostAction", "firstPostAction", "postAction1" etc. {1} is a number representing the zero-based index of the post action. Such as "5", or "0".

trans-unit.source: Source '{0}' in template does not exist.
trans-unit.target: A origem '{0}' no modelo não existe.

trans-unit.source: Source location '{0}' is outside the specified install source location.
trans-unit.target: O local de origem '{0}' está fora do local de origem da instalação especificado.

trans-unit.source: Source must be a directory, but '{0}' is a file.
trans-unit.target: A origem deve ser um diretório, mas '{0}' é um arquivo.

trans-unit.source: Source path relative to install location: '{0}'
trans-unit.target: Caminho de origem relativo ao local de instalação: '{0}'

trans-unit.source: Template: '{0}' - Template root is outside the specified install source location.
trans-unit.target: Modelo: '{0}' - A raiz do modelo está fora do local de origem de instalação especificado.
